message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14,000. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product.  What do you think?
I understand that $14,000 might be a bit steep, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm firm at $11,000. If you're not willing to come down to that price, I'll have to look elsewhere.
